title: Opinion: As a scientist and NFL widow, I am furious about a recent NFL Players Association-funded CTE study
description: “As a scientist, I am disgusted. As an NFL widow who witnessed unimaginable suffering, I am furious,” writes Eleanor M. Perfetto.
content: “As a scientist, I am disgusted. As an NFL widow who witnessed unimaginable suffering, I am furious,” writes Eleanor M. Perfetto.
